sentences.english: This paper makes a analysis into the karyotype of some species of Brassica vegetables grown in Chaozhou-Shantou area.
sentences.chinese: 對潮汕地區栽培的幾種蕓薹屬蔬菜的核型進行了分析。

sentences.english: In this paper, we give a detailed review about signal transduction of self-incompatibility in Brassica.
sentences.chinese: 主要針對蕓薹屬自交不親和細胞信號轉導作一綜述。
